ratings.comment: This is the best class I have taken in the Civil and Enviranmental Engineering. It should be the template class for all lecturers!

Absolutely great professor, I loved her lectures so much and she got me into transportation as a whole. Tests weren't impossible, lectures were recorded, extra credit was given, literally everything was there for you to succeed and she very clearly loves what she does. Highly recommend!

Sue is very friendly and understanding. Civil Engr 370 is not super difficult in terms of content, but the exams are relatively difficult and not easy when it comes to timing. The more practice you do, the better you will do in the class. Pretty easy to get a B in the class, but if you want an A or an AB you will need to work for it. E

Pretty straightforward material and is generous with grading exams and homework. Lab is essentially a discussion and Sue wants you to do well in the class. Quizzes are short and only based on lecture material for concepts. Exams can be difficult still, so be prepared.

Wanted you to do well in her course and was accessible outside of class. Had a fantastic TA and clear grading scheme. Generous grading on quizzes and gave extra credit quizzes. Material was clear and comprehensible.

Classes not hard but you can learn a lot. Mercy homework grading but very clear feedback. Exams could be a little challenging but you Would hardly miss any point if pay attention in class and do homework.
